quote_first: A bit weak, thought Robin, but the best he could do at
quote_last:
in the morning.
“Sure it wasn’t some beautiful girl?” said Mary.
“I’m afraid Jim and Fred could hardly be described as beautiful, even by their loving wives.”
title: Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less
author: Jeffrey Archer

title: The Sins of the Father
